Nine Mistakes That Kill Your Charisma

1. Not proactively introducing yourself
不夠主動介紹自己

2. Not introducing your friends
不介紹你朋友

3. Talking about things no one cares about
講一些沒有人在乎的事情

4. Not soliciting feedback
不留空間給對方回應

5. Trailing off or mumbling
離題或口齒含糊不清

6. Answering questions with single words
單一字彙回答

7. Whinging
抱怨

8. Not remembering names (with no effort)
不(嘗試)記得別人的名字

9. Lack of principle
沒有原則

我個人很不在行第二項, 常常變成讓我比較主動自我介紹的朋友去認識對方...
I'm personally really bad at #2, always ends up making my friends who are proactive at introducing themselves do the work 😂

其他我倒是還好，我嘗試不去做。我有時聊關於烹飪的事情會不小心做第三或五項
Others, not so much, at least I try not to. I think I sometimes find myself doing #3 (or #5), when it comes to cooking.

一開始別人可能會對於我講的有興趣，不過當我講的太嗨而開始形容過於詳細，對方會漸漸開始用一個字回答，我就會停下來或是直接問「我是不是講的太細了？」
At first people would be interested in what I talk about, but when I get too passionate and gives too much details, people would start giving me those one-word responses. Then I'd stop or flat out ask them "I'm getting too detailed huh?"

嗯...希望你們會喜歡這個影片😃
Well, hope you like the video :)

留言說說你中哪幾項，想要改善哪一項，或你如何避免它們發生。
Let me know which one(s) you do, want to improve on, or how you avoid doing them.

我有興趣聽聽不同的想法，以在未來遇到相同人士時能知道怎麼反應
I'd like to see the diversity in people, and learn how to think when/if I meet those who have similarities.

期待你們的回答~
Looking forward to reading your responses 🙋🏻‍♂️

下次見!
Au revoir!
